alert.note: Alert for Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 3:17PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila County through 400 PM MST... At 316 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carrizo to near Sawmill. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sawmill and Hilltop. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 261 and 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
